title: Precise Control of Process Parameters for >23% Efficiency Perovskite Solar Cells in Ambient Air Using an Automated Device Acceleration Platform
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01432D, Paper
Open Access

Jiyun Zhang, Jianchang Wu, Anastasia Barabash, Tian Du, Shudi Qiu, Vincent Marc Le Corre, Yicheng Zhao, Kaicheng Zhang, Frederik Schmitt, Zijian Peng, Jingjing Tian, Chaohui Li, Chao Liu, Thomas Heumueller, Larry Lüer, Jens Hauch, Christoph J Brabec
Achieving high-performance perovskite photovoltaics, especially in ambient air relies heavily on optimizing process parameters. However, traditional manual methods often struggle to effectively control the key variables. This inherent challenge requires...
